plot: A group of border house students embark on the search for a treasure when one of them discovers a long hidden secret in the attic.
plot_en: A group of border house students embark on the search for a treasure when one of them discovers a long hidden secret in the attic.
plot_es: A group of border house students embark on the search for a treasure when one of them discovers a long hidden secret in the attic.
title: Het Huis Anubis
